Get Women's College Basketball schedule for a specific year from ESPN's API

wbb_espn_scoreboard.Rd

Get Women's College Basketball schedule for a specific year from ESPN's API

wbb_espn_scoreboard(season)

Arguments

season

Either numeric or character

Value

Returns a tibble

Author

Thomas Mock, you a genius for this one.

Examples

# Get schedule from 2018 season (returns 1000 results, max allowable.)
# Must iterate through dates to get full year's schedule, as below:
wbb_espn_scoreboard (season = 2018)

#> Returning data for 2018!
#> # A tibble: 1,000 x 31
#>    matchup matchup_short season  type slug  game_id game_uid game_date
#>    <chr>   <chr>          <int> <int> <chr> <chr>   <chr>    <chr>    
#>  1 Alabam~ AAMU @ GRAM     2018     2 regu~ 400998~ s:40~l:~ 2018-01-~
#>  2 North ~ UNF @ WOF       2018     2 regu~ 400993~ s:40~l:~ 2018-01-~
#>  3 Arkans~ ARPB @ MVSU     2018     2 regu~ 400998~ s:40~l:~ 2018-01-~
#>  4 Alcorn~ ALCN @ PV       2018     2 regu~ 400998~ s:40~l:~ 2018-01-~
#>  5 Southe~ SOU @ TXSO      2018     2 regu~ 400998~ s:40~l:~ 2018-01-~
#>  6 Alabam~ ALST @ JKST     2018     2 regu~ 400998~ s:40~l:~ 2018-01-~
#>  7 Butler~ BUT @ VILL      2018     2 regu~ 400995~ s:40~l:~ 2018-01-~
#>  8 Americ~ AMER @ COLG     2018     2 regu~ 400996~ s:40~l:~ 2018-01-~
#>  9 Buckne~ BUCK @ BU       2018     2 regu~ 400996~ s:40~l:~ 2018-01-~
#> 10 Xavier~ XAV @ GTWN      2018     2 regu~ 400995~ s:40~l:~ 2018-01-~
#> # ... with 990 more rows, and 23 more variables: attendance <int>,
#> #   home_team_name <chr>, home_team_logo <chr>, home_team_abb <chr>,
#> #   home_team_id <chr>, home_team_location <chr>, home_team_full <chr>,
#> #   home_team_color <chr>, home_score <int>, home_win <int>, home_record <chr>,
#> #   away_team_name <chr>, away_team_logo <chr>, away_team_abb <chr>,
#> #   away_team_id <chr>, away_team_location <chr>, away_team_full <chr>,
#> #   away_team_color <chr>, away_score <int>, away_win <int>, away_record <chr>,
#> #   status_name <chr>, startDate <chr>
# Get schedule from date 2021-02-15
wbb_espn_scoreboard (season = "20210215")

#> Returning data for 20210215!
#> # A tibble: 21 x 31
#>    matchup matchup_short season  type slug  game_id game_uid game_date

#>  4 UNLV L~ UNLV @ SDSU     2021     2 regu~ 401283~ s:40~l:~ 2021-02-~
#>  5 Creigh~ CREI @ GTWN     2021     2 regu~ 401270~ s:40~l:~ 2021-02-~
#>  6 San Di~ USD @ PEPP      2021     2 regu~ 401289~ s:40~l:~ 2021-02-~
#>  7 Winthr~ WIN @ GWEB      2021     2 regu~ 401284~ s:40~l:~ 2021-02-~
#>  8 Easter~ EKY @ JVST      2021     2 regu~ 401284~ s:40~l:~ 2021-02-~
#>  9 Fairle~ FDU @ WAG       2021     2 regu~ 401295~ s:40~l:~ 2021-02-~
